maat 1.0.0

Plot module routes

Source: R/plot_functions.R
plotModuleRoutes.Rd

plotModuleRoutes is a function for building a chart for module routes.

plotModuleRoutes(
  examinee_list,
  assessment_structure,
  examinee_id = "all",
  font_size = 15,
  box_colour = "PaleTurquoise"
)

Arguments

examinee_list

the output from maat.
assessment_structure

an assessment_structure object.
examinee_id

the examinee ID to plot the module route. all plots the count that each routing node was used. (default = all)
font_size

the font size for the count labels. (default = 15)
box_colour

the colour for the boxes. (default = PaleTurquoise)
